O_mGWr3LN7s.title: Spotlight: Grab Dos & Don'ts!
O_mGWr3LN7s.description: In light of recent news, it looks like we will be stuck with Grab for the time being, and let's have a look at the Dos and Don'ts when riding or driving with Grab!

UgxTKJYrhKj1Dq_hWVx4AaABAg.textOriginal: You must have put a lot of effort in the information! Well done!

F02XrPcaQrg.title: Pemandu Grab maut dijerut
F02XrPcaQrg.description: Misteri kehilangan seorang pemandu Grab terjawab selepas ditemui mati akibat dijerut di dalam kenderaannya berdekatan Flat Selayang baru malam tadi.
